thread.title: If you’re a fan of creepy clowns, you’ll just love this motel (8 Photos)
thread.title_full: If you’re a fan of creepy clowns, you’ll just love this motel (8 Photos)

author: Hendy
title: If you’re a fan of creepy clowns, you’ll just love this motel (8 Photos)
text:
source 
Have you ever wandered into a place and thought to yourself: “Yup, this is where it all ends for me. Goodbye world.” Well, if you haven’t head over to the Clown Motel and maybe you’ll get to experience that dreaded feeling too! 2 
Situated in Tonopah, Nevada, a town that has no more than 3,000 residents, The Clown Motel stands in all its polka-doty glory. 3 
Upon entering, you’ll find that the place is absolutely filled with all things clown related. 4 
Oh look a little shop! That’s fun. 5 
Nope. Not a shop. The clown figurines are just for looking. Looking at you, that is. Advertisement
